Name: Small Press Tycoon
About the game: SMALL PRESS TYCOON is the original DIY publishing adventure sim. Print chapbooks and zines, hold readings, discover new and exciting authors, sign distribution deals, and even win industry awards! Live out your literary dreams. Give spell-binding lectures for rapt audiences and sell your wares at book fairs. Discover mysterious manuscripts in the bowels of the library. Navigate the rocky terrain of the literary world and make choices that matter - no two presses are alike. Featuring all-new music tracks by PC CREATIONS
